archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.2.1a: a) using approved, secure methods of applying updates (e.g. via removable media at the web server console: transferring files using TLS, IPsec or equivalent; and accessing the web console using secure shell (SSH) or secure file transfer protocol (FTP) from a predefined IP address)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
